original_text: But Barzillai said to the king, “How many years have I still to live, that I should go up with the king to Jerusalem?
korean_text: 바르실래가 왕께 아뢰되 내 생명의 날이 얼마나 있사옵겠기에 어찌 왕과 함께 예루살렘으로 올라가리이까

sentences.original_text: But Barzillai said to the king,
"How many years have I still to live,
that I should go up with the king to Jerusalem?"
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 왕과 함께 예루살렘으로 올라가야 하겠습니까?"
